summary: The module provides an example implementation of Graph Attention Networks (GAT) using the Deep Graph Library (DGL) with TensorFlow, applying sparse matrixâ€‘vector (SPMV) optimizations for efficient graph convolutions. It defines a lightweight utility class that initializes the GAT layers and offers a simple interface to execute the model on graph data.
business_intent: To illustrate how to construct and run a GAT model in TensorFlow with DGL, serving as a reference for researchers, developers, or students building graph neural network solutions.
